snippet: A state judge ruled Monday that Texas can cut off financing to Planned Parenthood’s family planning programs for poor women.
abstract: Texas Judge Gary Harger rules that state can cut off financing to Planned Parenthood's family planning programs for poor women; another hearing is scheduled with a different judge on Jan 11, when agency will again ask for an injunction to receive state financing.
lead_paragraph: A state judge ruled Monday that Texas can cut off financing to Planned Parenthood’s family planning programs for poor women.

headline.seo: Texas Judge Approves Cuts to Planned Parenthood
headline.main: Texas: Judge Approves Cuts to Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: Texas: Judge Approves Cuts To Planned Parenthood
